original_text: Remember what the Lord thy God did unto Miriam by the way, after that ye were come forth out of Egypt.
korean_text: 너희는 애굽에서 나오는 길에서 네 하나님 여호와께서 미리암에게 행하신 일을 기억할지니라

sentences.original_text: Remember what the Lord thy God did
sentences.korean_translation: 주 당신의 하나님이 하신 것을 기억하라

sentences.original_text: after that ye were come forth out of Egypt
